text:
Robert Molimard (16 December 1927 – 9 January 2020) was a French doctor. He served as a professor at Paris-Sud University. He was a pioneer in tobacco research in France. He worked on four publications. His last publication was "L’Homme, avatar de Dieu" in 2016.
Molimard was born in Cournon-d'Auvergne. He died on 9 January 2020, at the age of 92.
